content: It's always a little confusing that when you are in "Private Messages", you still get a 'new topic' button - does this mean some kind of private topic? (no, I believe the answer is). It's also problematic that once you are in a private message stream, the 'send private message' button disappears, and the only way to get back is to go somewhere else and then back to all private messages... kind of a reticent button, that one
no, maybe you don't have to go somewhere else... but it still feels odd to me
Good point; we should definitely fade out "New topic"
@Rishi Gupta I'm not sure I agree; I think the label should change. It's totally useful to have a way to start sending something to another place with the mouse while looking at a PM thread.
sure, changing to "New stream message" or something also seems reasonable.
Yeah, let's do that. Open an issue?
